events.message: The applicant has submitted the personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses and some existing credit card debt.
The loan has been categorised under Personal Loan as the purpose is primarily to manage medical bills and consolidate debt effectively.
A loan officer has been assigned to provide in-depth guidance and support throughout the personal loan application process.
Initial review of the application and submitted information now underway, focusing on applicant’s credit history and declared loan purpose.
Additional documents requested including recent medical bills and proof of income to verify the need and repayment capabilities.
Applicant has promptly submitted all requested documents, including detailed medical statements and updated financial records.
Credit check performed with results indicating a moderate credit score but consistent payment history on previous obligations.
Risk assessment conducted indicating manageable risk, given applicant’s employment stability and documented medical expenses.
Loan offer presented with favorable terms including a competitive interest rate structured for a 3-year repayment plan.
Applicant responded positively to the loan offer, mentioning appreciation for the flexible terms and clear repayment schedule.
Application escalated to senior credit analyst for a final internal review due to the medical-related nature of the loan.
The loan has been approved after thorough review, confirming that the applicant meets all credit and compliance requirements.
The approved funds have been disbursed to the applicant’s designated account for immediate use toward medical and debt payments.
Conducted follow-up with the applicant to ensure satisfaction and to offer assistance with managing repayments and account setup.
The personal loan application has been successfully closed following completion of funding and initial follow-up procedures.
